ProjectTitle: Validation of the sugar kinases as an antifungal drug target in Candida glabrata
InitialFeedbackHistory:
31/05/2023
Storage: it is more secure to store all your data on a KU Leuven solution, have a look at the storage guide for the different options: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Sharing: Since you don't mention factors restricting sharing consider using a data repository, for example RDR or a disciplinary repository, e.g. EBI (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/), for more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
